00027 ##Class for Extracting Products from FB-XML Productfiles
00028 class FB_XMLHandler(xml.sax.ContentHandler):
00029 
00030     __LogObj = None
00031     __products = []
00032     __prod = None
00033     __prod_XMLHandler = None         #private object of FB_ProductXMLHandler
00034     __app_XMLHandler = None          #private object of FB_AppXMLHandler
00035     __comm_XMLHandler = None         #private object of FB_CommXMLHandler
00036     __prod2progr_XMLHandler = None   #privtae object of FB_Prod2ProgrXMLHandler
00037     __mask_XMLHandler = None         #private object of FB_Mask
00038     __locator = None
00039 
00040     #Constructor for FB_XMLHandler.
00041     def __init__(self, LogObj):
00042         self.__LogObj = LogObj
00043         #Product-Handling
00044         self.__prod_XMLHandler = FB_ProductXMLHandler.FB_ProductXMLHandler(self.__LogObj)
00045         #Application-Handling
00046         self.__app_XMLHandler = FB_AppXMLHandler.FB_AppXMLHandler(self.__LogObj)
00047         #Communication-objects Handling
00048         self.__comm_XMLHandler = FB_CommXMLHandler.FB_CommXMLHandler(self.__LogObj)
00049         #Product to Program objects Handling
00050         self.__prod2progr_XMLHandler = FB_Prod2ProgrXMLHandler.FB_Prod2ProgrXMLHandler(self.__LogObj)
00051         #Mask object Handling
00052         self.__mask_XMLHandler = FB_MaskXMLHandler.FB_MaskXMLHandler(self.__LogObj)
00053 
00054     #return List of Instances of type FB_Products
00055     def getProductList(self):
00056         return self.__prod_XMLHandler.getProductList()
00057 
00058     #return List of Instances of type FB_Applications
00059     def getAppList(self):
00060         return self.__app_XMLHandler.getAppList()
00061 
00062     #return List of Instances of type FB_Manufacturer
00063     def getManufacturerList(self):
00064         return self.__app_XMLHandler.getManufacturerList()
00065 
00066     #return List of Instances of type FB_CommunicationObj
00067     def getCommObjList(self):
00068         return self.__comm_XMLHandler.getCommObjList()
00069 
00070     #return List of INstances of type FB_Prod2Progr
00071     def getProd2ProgrList(self):
00072         return self.__prod2progr_XMLHandler.getProduct2ProgramList()
00073 
00074     #return List of Instances of type FB_Mask
00075     def getMaskList(self):
00076         return self.__mask_XMLHandler.getMaskList()
00077 
00078     #return Locator-Data (position of parser)
00079     def getLocator(self):
00080         #print self.__locator.getLineNumber
00081         return self.__locator

00085     def startDocument(self):
00086         try:
00087             #print "Start"
00088             pass
00089 
00090         except SAXException:
00091             print "SAXError"
00092 
00093     def endDocument(self):
00094         try:
00095             #print "Ende"
00096             pass
00097 
00098         except SAXException:
00099             print "SAXError"
00100 
00101 
00102 
00103     def startElement(self, eName, attrs):
00104         try:
00105            # if(self.__locator != None):
00106            #     print self.__locator.getLineNumber()
00107            #     print self.__locator.getColumnNumber()
00108 
00109             self.__prod_XMLHandler.startElement(eName, attrs)
00110             self.__app_XMLHandler.startElement(eName, attrs)
00111             self.__comm_XMLHandler.startElement(eName, attrs)
00112             self.__prod2progr_XMLHandler.startElement(eName, attrs)
00113             self.__mask_XMLHandler.startElement(eName, attrs)
00114 
00115         except SAXException:
00116             print "Error again"
00117 
00118     def endElement(self,eName):
00119         try:
00120             self. __prod_XMLHandler.endElement(eName)
00121             self.__app_XMLHandler.endElement(eName)
00122             self.__comm_XMLHandler.endElement(eName)
00123             self.__prod2progr_XMLHandler.endElement(eName)
00124             self.__mask_XMLHandler.endElement(eName)
00125 
00126         except SAXException:
00127             print "Error again"
00128 
00129 
00130     def characters(self ,char):
00131         try:
00132             self.__prod_XMLHandler.characters(char)
00133             self.__app_XMLHandler.characters(char)
00134             self.__comm_XMLHandler.characters(char)
00135             self.__prod2progr_XMLHandler.characters(char)
00136             self.__mask_XMLHandler.characters(char)
00137 
00138         except SAXException:
00139              print "Error again"
00140 
00141     def setDocumentLocator(self, locator):
00142         #print "set"
00143         self.__locator = locator
